Name: Space Slingshot VR
About the game: In a spaceship, you need to shot down all the rats cause they are too cute, Spacer don't like cute rats, Spacer just need funny and interesting. By the way, You can shot those tanks and explode them. And only when all the rats were killed, can you pass the next level. Be ready to : * Crack up or laugh a lot ; * Inspired by classic slingshot games ; * Enjoy different levels and excite the breathtaking altitude ; * Get close to the animal using the joystick and communicate with them ; * Appreciate the exquisite structure of slingshot when it stretching ; * Shoot tank for a bigger explosion and cherish your bullets ; * Hit wood would have a better effect than hit tank sometime ;
